::: {.callout-tip title="Installing Julia" collapse="true"}

This assumes that you don't have any version of Julia on your computer. If you have one, please consult with a higher authority.

To get a very nice working installation:

- install [JuliaUp](https://github.com/JuliaLang/juliaup): keep Julia versions up to date
- install [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/)
- inside VSCode, install the Julia extension

:::
